_meanings:
sum
and substance, meaning in short 
(often used by commentators).

having such a thing or things at
the beginning, so forth, et cætera
(&c.).

{1} not fit to be 
believed, untrustworthy.

proper or necessary to be
done according to certain rules.

any 
proper or necessary duty, obligation;
{#itikartavyatAmUQaH#} wholly at a loss what
to do, embarrassed, perplexed.
